fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When this is rolled, run the following effects then reroll.
- Players in factions all have the same role. (For instance, every townie being Sheriff or every Mafia being Blackmailer).
- This rule surpasses Unique Roles unless the role becomes broken with multiple of the same role, in which case reroll.
- This rule surpasses specified alignments in a rolelist.
- Only exception to this modifier are required roles, such as Mafia requiring Mafioso. In this scenario, only one player rolls the required role.
- Roles may still be changed, altered, or swapped during the game.
- Town is not alerted of this modifier.
